players.name: Bob
memory: Charlie: "Based on my investigation last night, I believe Bob is the mafioso."
Diana: "I believe Charlie is the mafioso because he said Bob was the mafioso and now he's trying to deflect attention from himself."
Charlie: "I am not the mafioso, I'm just trying to solve this case."
You: "I am the mafioso, and I killed Alice last night. I'm not trying to deflect attention; I'm just protecting my identity."
